articles.title: Battlefield 6 Preorders Are Live For $70 With Exclusive Bonuses - GameSpot
articles.description: Battlefield 6 launches October 10, and preorders include exclusive in-game cosmetics and even a $10 Best Buy gift card.

articles.title: Clock in and Lock in for Double Rewards on Odd Jobs - Rockstar Games
articles.description: Supplement your GTA Online criminal endeavors by moonlighting with Odd Jobs — legal and legitimate ways of earning money that keep Los Santos’ economy humming, and they’re all paying out Double Rewards through August 6.

articles.title: Your public ChatGPT queries are getting indexed by Google and other search engines - TechCrunch
articles.description: Search engines are indexing links to ChatGPT conversations that have been made sharable with a link.

articles.title: Hideo Kojima Refuses To Play Konami's Metal Gear Solid 3 Remake - GameSpot
articles.description: The creator of Metal Gear Solid, Hideo Kojima, laughingly dismisses the idea of ever playing Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater.

articles.title: EA Entertainment President on ‘Battlefield 6’ Release Date, ‘Sims’ Movie and Multiplayer Game Update, and Balancing Owned IP With ‘Star Wars’ and Marvel Titles (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
articles.description: Electronic Arts revealed Thursday that its eagerly anticipated "Battlefield 6" will be released Oct. 10.

articles.title: More than 14,000 total entrants, 16 represented games across both lineups and a whole lot of big names — EventHubs' Evo 2025 preview - EventHubs
articles.description: Evo 2025 is about to be upon us once more and while it may not hit the record-breaking heights of last year's events, it's hard to not be impressed at the massive 14,000 total signups across the ...
